When the chosen player draws the named card, sacrifice Booby Trap. If you do, Booby Trap deals 10 damage to that player.

--William Knox, "Mortality"

mc.printedText: Tap an untapped creature you control: Llanowar Behemoth gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText:
"Most people can't build decent weapons out of stone or steel. Trust the elves to do it with only mud and vines."
--Gerrard of the Weatherlight

mc.name: Looming Shade
mc.oracleText: {B}: Looming Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {B}: Looming Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

mc.printedText:

{1}{B}, {T}: Return target Zombie card from your graveyard to your hand.
mc.flavorText: "I confer with Death itself. What could you possibly do to injure me?"

mc.name: Creeping Mold
mc.oracleText: Destroy target artifact, enchantment, or land.
mc.printedText: Destroy target artifact, enchantment, or land.
mc.flavorText: Mold crept over the walls and into every crevice until the gleaming white stone strained and burst.

mc.name: Festering Goblin

mc.printedText: When Festering Goblin is put into a graveyard from play, target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: In life, it was a fetid, disease-ridden thing. In death, not much changed.

mc.printedText: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying.)
mc.flavorText: Of royal blood among the spirits of the air, the Mahamoti djinn rides on the wings of the winds. As dangerous in the gambling hall as he is in battle, he is a master of trickery and misdirection.

mc.name: Mana Clash

mc.printedText: You and target opponent each flip a coin. Mana Clash deals 1 damage to each player whose coin comes up tails. Repeat this process until both players' coins come up heads on the same flip.

mc.name: Mana Leak
mc.oracleText: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.
mc.printedText: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.
mc.flavorText: The fatal flaw in every plan is the assumption that you know more than your enemy.

mc.name: Maro
mc.oracleText: Maro's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your hand.
mc.printedText: Maro's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your hand.
mc.flavorText: No two see the same Maro.

mc.name: Master Decoy
mc.oracleText: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.
mc.printedText: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.
mc.flavorText: A skilled decoy can throw your enemies off your trail. A master decoy can survive to do it again.

mc.printedText: {T}: Prevent the next 4 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
mc.flavorText: Behind his eyes is the pain of every soldier his hands have healed.

mc.printedText: Whenever an opponent discards a card, Megrim deals 2 damage to that player.
mc.flavorText:
"You can run from your pain, but you will tire before it does."
--Gerrard of the Weatherlight

mc.name: Crafty Pathmage
mc.oracleText: {T}: Target creature with power 2 or less is unblockable this turn.
mc.printedText: {T}: Target creature with power 2 or less is unblockable this turn.
mc.flavorText:
Follow the pathmage
--Otarian expression meaning
"escape quickly"

mc.name: Withering Gaze
mc.oracleText: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You draw a card for each Forest and green card in it.
mc.printedText: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You draw a card for each Forest and green card in it.
mc.flavorText: "Nature cares not for the knowledge to be gained from its study. Better to bleed it dry, lest its potential be wasted on lizards and leaves."

mc.name: Might of Oaks

mc.printedText: Target creature gets +7/+7 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: "Guess where I'm gonna plant this"

mc.printedText: {2}, {T}: Target player puts the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

mc.name: Mind Rot
mc.oracleText: Target player discards two cards.
mc.printedText: Target player discards two cards.
mc.flavorText:
"The beauty of mental attacks is that your victims never remember them."

mc.printedText: Whenever an opponent plays a spell, Mogg Sentry gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

--Taseen, elvish bard

mc.printedText: Ogre Taskmaster can't block.
mc.flavorText: Three little goblins, enjoying their brew. One bumped an ogre, and then there were two.

mc.printedText: {T}: All damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn by a source of your choice is dealt to Oracle's Attendants instead.

mc.printedText: {T}: Orcish Artillery deals 2 damage to target creature or player and 3 damage to you.
mc.flavorText:

--General Khurzog

mc.printedText:
Enchant creature (Target a creature as you play this. This card comes into play attached to that creature.)
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.

mc.flavorText:
"Of all the tyrannies on humane kind

--John Dryden,
"The Hind and the Panther"

mc.printedText: Phantom Warrior is unblockable.
mc.flavorText:

--Ralph Waldo Emerson, "Illusions"

mc.printedText: As long as Thran Golem is enchanted, it gets +2/+2 and has flying, first strike, and trample.

mc.name: Phyrexian Hulk
mc.flavorText:
It doesn't think. It doesn't feel.
It doesn't laugh or cry.
All it does from dusk till dawn
Is make the soldiers die.
--Onean children's rhyme

mc.printedText: Whenever a creature is dealt damage, destroy it. It can't be regenerated.
mc.flavorText:
"Neither could I forget what I had read of these pits--that the sudden extinction of life formed no part of their most horrible plan."
--Edgar Allan Poe,
"The Pit and the Pendulum"

mc.printedText: Swampwalk (This creature is unblockable as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)

mc.printedText: Counter target creature spell.

mc.printedText: When Rukh Egg is put into a graveyard from play, put a 4/4 red Bird creature token with flying into play at end of turn.
mc.flavorText: Called "stonefeathers" by many lowlanders, rukhs are thought to descend from a phoenix that sacrificed its flame for a body of stone.

mc.name: Zodiac Monkey

mc.printedText: Forestwalk (This creature is unblockable as long as defending player controls a Forest.)
mc.flavorText: It lives mainly on fruit, leaves, and the occasional nose.

mc.printedText: Whenever a spell or ability an opponent controls causes a land to be put into your graveyard from play, return that land to play.
mc.flavorText: The knight knelt and prayed, first for the sanctity of his land and second for the strength to repel its invaders.

mc.name: Sacred Nectar
mc.oracleText: You gain 4 life.
mc.printedText: You gain 4 life.
mc.flavorText:
"Over the silver mountains,
Where spring the nectar fountains,
There will I kiss
The bowl of bliss;
And drink my everlasting fill. . . ."
--Sir Walter Raleigh, "The Pilgrimage"

mc.name: Samite Healer
mc.oracleText: {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
mc.printedText: {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.

mc.name: Savannah Lions
mc.flavorText:
Even the brave are scared by a lion three times: first by its tracks, again by its roar, and one last time face to face.
--Somali proverb

mc.name: Scathe Zombies
mc.flavorText:
"They groaned, they stirred, they all uprose,
Nor spake, nor moved their eyes;
It had been strange, even in a dream,
To have seen those dead men rise."
--Samuel Taylor Coleridge,
"The Rime of the Ancient Mariner"

mc.name: Sea Monster
mc.oracleText: Sea Monster can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.
mc.printedText: Sea Monster can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.
mc.flavorText: It's easy to believe the monster is a myth--until you feel three hundred thousand pounds of myth crashing down on your ship.

mc.name: Serra Angel

mc.printedText:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying.)
Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
mc.flavorText: When she flies above the good, they consider themselves blessed. When she flies above the wicked, they consider themselves dead.

mc.printedText: Dream Prowler is unblockable as long as it's attacking alone.
mc.flavorText:

Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying.)

mc.printedText: When Mindslicer is put into a graveyard from play, each player discards his or her hand.

mc.printedText: Whenever another creature comes into play, you gain 1 life.

--Vec teaching

mc.oracleText: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying.)
mc.printedText: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying.)
mc.flavorText: A blade that has never known sheath, a hilt that has never known hand.

mc.printedText: Target player puts the top half of his or her library, rounded down, into his or her graveyard.
mc.flavorText: You won't know what you're missing.

mc.printedText: {R}: Flowstone Shambler gets +1/-1 until end of turn.

mc.printedText: {1}{W}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to Zealous Inquisitor this turn is dealt to target creature instead.
mc.flavorText: Wine and balm for the confessions of the repentant. Razors and irons for the confessions of the unrepentant.

mc.oracleText: {R}: Flowstone Crusher gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {R}: Flowstone Crusher gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText:
"What's better than smashing things with a rock? A rock that gets up and smashes things for you."

mc.printedText: {1}{G}: Return target basic land card from your graveyard to your hand.
mc.flavorText: "Soldiers speak of defending the soil, but they care only for their nations. I care nothing for their nations and everything for the soil."

mc.printedText: {U}{U}{U}, {T}: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.

--Temporal Manipulation 101 final exam,

mc.printedText: Target opponent sacrifices a creature.

"No mockeries now for them; no prayers nor bells, / Nor any voice of mourning save the choirs,-- / The shrill, demented choirs of wailing shells."
--Wilfred Owen,
"Anthem for Doomed Youth"

mc.flavorText: He's smart for a goblin. He can do two things: hit and run.

mc.name: Vizzerdrix
mc.flavorText: A bored wizard once created a vizzerdrix out of a bunny and a piranha. He never made that mistake again.

mc.name: Index

mc.printedText: Look at the top five cards of your library, then put them back in any order.
mc.flavorText: "Let's see . . . Mercadia, mercenary, merfolk . . . you know, I really need a better filing system."

mc.name: Spined Wurm
mc.flavorText:
"I wouldn't stand in front of that wurm, son. 'Course, I wouldn't stand behind it neither. In fact, standing anywhere near that wurm's not much of a plan. Running, now that's a plan"
--Wandering mage

mc.name: Ornithopter

mc.printedText: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying.)
mc.flavorText:
"It has been my honor to improve on the Thran's original design. Perhaps history will remember me in some small part for my work."
--Urza, in his apprenticeship

mc.printedText: {1}, {T}: You gain 1 life.
mc.flavorText: The bloom contains no seeds. It's meant only to nourish the forest's inhabitants.
